author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FLOSSIE RAPIDLY WEAKENING AS IT PASSES SOUTH OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR...
summary: ...FLOSSIE RAPIDLY WEAKENING AS IT PASSES SOUTH OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... As of 8:00 PM MST Wed Jul 02 the center of Flossie was located near 19.8, -110.2 with movement NW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 986 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...FLOSSIE RAPIDLY WEAKENING AS IT PASSES SOUTH OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... As of 8:00 PM MST Wed Jul 02 the center of Flossie was located near 19.8, -110.2 with movement NW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 986 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Flossie (EP1/EP062025)
